title: BBC Local Live: Sheffield and South Yorkshire on Monday 14 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: woman arrested in doncaster murder investigation released on bail .
planners expected to back olympic legacy park on site of don valley stadium .
power station collapse : families of missing rotherham men in protest .

documents.title: good evening : our live coverage across the day
text: that 's the end of our live coverage for today .
thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back with more news , travel , sport and weather updates from across south yorkshire from 08:00 tomorrow .
do n't forget to catch up with how harry and paul did on day five of their three-legged sport relief challenge , from halifax to bradford .
watch bbc look north tonight at 18:30 .
author: Oliver Wright
BBC News Online, Yorkshire

documents.title: weather : dry this evening with a touch of frost
text: it 's staying dry into the evening and overnight , with a touch of frost possible across inland rural areas .
eastern districts , such as those surrounding doncaster , should see increasingly cloudy conditions , perhaps culminating in extensive low cloud or fog towards dawn .
minimum temperature : 4c ( 39f ) .
tuesday is likely to be cloudier day than monday with limited brighter intervals as the easterly breeze brings periods of low cloud , mainly to eastern parts .
maximum temperature : 10 deg c ( 50 deg f )
author: Keeley Donovan
BBC Look North

documents.title: smoke alarm warning after smoking-in-bed fire inquest in doncaster
text: fire chiefs have warned people about the dangers of having no working smoke alarms in their homes following an inquest into the death of a doncaster man in a fire last october .
ian jennings , 61 , died in a fire at a house in pinfold close , tickill .
which is thought to have been caused by a discarded cigarette .
investigators found no evidence of working smoke alarms inside the property .
a verdict of accidental death was recorded at today 's inquest .
fire investigation officer graham toms said : `` the incident is also another , terrible reminder of the dangers associated with smoking in bed .
whilst we will never know whether smoke alarms would have made a difference at this incident , smoke alarms do give you vital extra seconds to escape . ''
author: Oliver Wright
BBC News Online, Yorkshire

documents.title: thousands of illegal cigarettes seized by trading standards in barnsley
text: barnsley council trading standards department has seized 12,000 cigarettes worth more than £ 2,000 during a large scale operation against illegal tobacco .
author: Oliver Wright
BBC News Online, Yorkshire

documents.title: latest headlines : balby murder suspect bailed and power station collapse families in 'peaceful protest '
text: the top stories in sheffield and south yorkshire so far today include :
author: Oliver Wright
BBC News Online, Yorkshire

documents.title: cricket : yorkshire 's willey takes hat-trick against england
text: england won their final world twenty20 warm-up game by 14 runs despite one of their own bowlers , yorkshire 's david willey , taking a hat-trick against them .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: adkins backs sharp to reach 20-goal mark
text: sheffield united manager nigel adkins has said he believes striker billy sharp will reach the 20-goal mark before the season ends .
sharp scored his 16th of the season on saturday as the blades recorded a 3-0 win over league one relegation strugglers oldham athletic .
adkins said : `` billy is always going to go and score goals and by his own admission he should have scored a lot more already . ''
author: Rob Staton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: x factor star visits rotherham hos
text: x factor winner louisa johnson and fellow finalists hit the right note with patients , families and staff during a visit to bluebell wood children 's hos in rotherham .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: ralf little on potting at the home of snooker
text: actor ralf little , who 's starring in comedy-thriller the nap at the crucible , has been telling me what it feels like to pot a ball at the home of snooker .
it 's a real pleasure to be here .
i take a shot in the play and every single time there 's just this moment where i completely accidentally come out of character and go 'i just took a snooker shot on the crucible stage .
boom ! '
it 's kind of fun .
he stars alongside mark addy and jack o'connell in the play by richard bean , the award-winning writer ofone man , two guvnors .
to hear more listen to bbc radio sheffield from 16:00 .
author: Tom Ingall
Journalist, BBC Look North

documents.title: rotherham 's 'never say die attitude ' secures 3-3 draw
text: rotherham manager neil warnock has praised his side 's positive attitude after they came back from 3-0 down to grab a draw against derby county .
leon best scored a last-minute equaliser to level the match and secure a point for the millers .
warnock said : `` from 3-0 down it should 've been game , set and match but our never say die attitude was fantastic .
one guy said to me '20 years i 've been coming and i 've never seen owt like that ' .
author: Rob Staton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: south yorkshire 's weather : dry and bright
text: it 'll be a dry and a bright afternoon with good spells of sunshine .
there 'll be a gentle easterly breeze so it 'll feel a little cooler along the east coast with wispy scattered cloud .
the maximum temperature will be around 10c ( 50f ) .
author: Kay Crewdson
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: balby murder investigation : did you see victim in week before his death ?
text: detectives investigating the killing of christopher cumpsty , whose body was found at his home in balby on friday , have appealed for witnesses .
det ch insp victoria short said : `` as part of our inquiries , we are keen to trace christopher 's last known movements in the week or so leading up to his death .
do you know christopher ?
have you seen him during the month of march ?
any piece of information , no matter how small , could prove vital to our investigation so i 'd urge you to get in touch . ''

documents.title: balby murder investigation : victim named by police
text: police have named a man whose body was discovered at a house in balby as 43-year-old christopher cumpsty .
mr cumpsty 's body was found at his home address in cross street at about 04:30 gmt on friday .
a 41-year-old woman arrested on sus of murder has been released on bail pending further inquiries .

documents.title: man arrested over catcliffe graveyard theft
text: a man has been arrested on sus of stealing a woman 's handbag as she tended her husband 's grave .
south yorkshire police said the 80-year-old woman had her bag taken at the graveyard at st mary 's church , catcliffe , at about 14:35 gmt on 8 march .
the force said a 33-year-old man from the treeton area had been arrested in connection with the incident .

documents.title: olympic legacy park would provide 'desperately needed ' home for sheffield sharks
text: we reported earlier that sheffield city council are expected to approve plans this week to develop the site of the former don valley stadium .
now , the chairman of the sheffield sharks basketball team has said building a new £ 3.5m sports arena on the site would provide the club with a `` desperately needed '' home .

yuri matischen said : `` the indoor community arena is beyond just the sharks , it 's a home for us , which is fantastic and one thing that we desperately need , but it 's a facility that will be available to a number of different sports . ''

documents.title: woman bailed in balby murder investigation
text: a woman arrested on sus of murder following the discovery of a man 's body at a house in doncaster has been released on bail .
the body of a 43-year-old man was found by emergency services at a property on cross street , balby at 04:30 gmt on friday .
south yorkshire police said the man , who has not been formally identified , died from multiple injuries .
a force spokesman said the woman had been bailed pending further inquires .

documents.title: latest headlines : balby murder suspect bailed and olympic legacy park set for approval
text: the top stories in sheffield and south yorkshire so far today include :
author: Oliver Wright
BBC Local Live

documents.title: power station collapse : families of missing rotherham men hold protest
text: the families of three missing workers feared trapped following a collapse at didcot power station have held a `` peaceful protest '' at the site .
two of the three families have previously criticised the rescue operation saying it has been too slow .
christopher huxtable , 34 , from swansea , ken cresswell , 57 , and john shaw , 61 , both from rotherham , are still missing in the rubble .
mr cresswell 's aunt gail said : `` we 've got to have them home , we need them home - they need out of this .
they 're hard-working men who have worked down here all this time and this is the thanks they get , left under rubble all this time . ''

documents.title: sheffield 's worst robbery hotspots revealed
text: more police funding has been demanded after figures obtained by he star reveal a rise in robberies across south yorkshire since 2011 .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: wednesday considering appeal against bannan red card
text: sheffield wednesday 's head coach , carlos carvalhal , has said the club is considering an appeal against barry bannan 's red card .
bannan was was shown a straight red card for a dangerous tackle on eric lichaj , as the owls beat nottingham forest 3-0 .
carvalhal said : `` i do n't speak about the referee , but let 's see what will happen if we can appeal or not about the situation . ''
author: Rob Staton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: second man charged in connection with chesterfield arson
text: police in chesterfield have now charged a second man in connection with an arson attack earlier this month in which a 32-year-old woman died .
gemma stevens was found dead inside the house in catherine street in brampton .
jamie bray , 26 , of kingsclere walk in chesterfield , will appear in court this morning charged with arson .
thirty-five-year-old gary tyson , of shirland street , has already been charged with murder .
author: Everard Davy
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: sheffield 's 'olympic legacy park ' plans set for green light
text: plans to build a new £ 3.5m sports arena , outdoor venue , and research centre on the site of the former don valley stadium in sheffield are expected to get planning approval this week .
the park is a joint venture between sheffield hallam university , sheffield teaching hospitals and the council .
the indoor community arena will be the new home of the sheffield sharks basketball team .
author: Kate Linderholm
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sport relief : here 's today 's route for paul and harry 's three-legged challenge
text: paul and harry have just over 14km ( nine miles ) to cover today between halifax and bradford in their three-legged walk for sport relief .
they got a stunning view from halifax sky centre today
author: Amy Nagy
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: power station collapse : families of missing men from rotherham hold protest
text: the families of three missing workers feared trapped following a collapse at didcot power station have held a `` peaceful protest '' at the site .
two of the three families have previously criticised the rescue operation saying it has been too slow .
ken cresswell , 57 , and john shaw , 61 , both from rotherham , and christopher huxtable , 34 , from swansea , are still missing in the rubble .

documents.title: latest headlines : police question balby murder suspect and olympic legacy park plans due for approval
text: the top stories in sheffield and south yorkshire include :
author: Kate Linderholm
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel news : part of athol road , sheffield closed due to an accident
text: athol road in sheffield is closed and slow in traffic in both directions between the junction with little london road and the smithywood road junction because of an accident .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: woman arrested in doncaster murder investigation
text: a woman has been arrested on sus of murder following the discovery of a man 's body at a house in doncaster .
the body of a 43-year-old man was found by emergency services at a property on cross street , balby on friday .
south yorkshire police said the man , who has not been formally identified , died from multiple injuries .

documents.title: south yorkshire 's weather : brightening up with sunny spells
text: a rather grey start to the day with mist and fog patches .
however , slowly brightening up with some sunny spells into the afternoon .
watch my forecast here
author: Kay Crewdson
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: hello and welcome to bbc local live in leeds and west yorkshire on monday 14 march 2016 .
i 'll be with you until 18:00 with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel updates from across the county .
why not get in touch with us today ?
i 'm looking forward to hearing your news , views and comments .
author: Kate Linderholm
BBC Local Live
